sys_script.name: Leave Request Fail

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_9da78e2ac3b26610a7f1b813e40131f9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1800027_leve_sys_leave_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Leave Request Fail</name><order>51</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Run this in a background script to test with real data
function testLeaveValidation() {
    try {
        // First, find a user who has a leave balance
        var balanceGR = new GlideRecord('x_1800027_leve_sys_leave_balance');
        balanceGR.setLimit(1);
        balanceGR.query();
        
        if (!balanceGR.next()) {
            return 'No leave balance records found in the system.';
        }
        
        // Now we have a valid balance record, use its values for testing
        var userID = balanceGR.employee;
        var leaveType = balanceGR.leave_type;
        var year = balanceGR.year;
        
        // Create a test request
        var testRequest = new GlideRecord('x_1800027_leve_sys_leave_request');
        testRequest.initialize();
        testRequest.requested_by = userID;
        testRequest.leave_type = leaveType;
        testRequest.duration = 1;
        testRequest.start_date = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
        
        // Log the test data
        gs.info('=== Testing Leave Validation ===');
        gs.info('Using User: ' + userID + ' (' + balanceGR.employee.getDisplayValue() + ')');
        gs.info('Leave Type: ' + leaveType + ' (' + balanceGR.leave_type.getDisplayValue() + ')');
        gs.info('Year: ' + year);
        gs.info('Available Balance: ' + balanceGR.available_balance);
        
        return 'Test completed. Check system logs for details.';
        
    } catch(ex) {
        gs.error('Test Error: ' + ex);
        return 'Test failed: ' + ex.message;
    }
}

// Run the test
testLeaveValidation();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-20 18:00:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9da78e2ac3b26610a7f1b813e40131f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Leave Request Fail</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1800027_leve_sys">9b184465c3beaa10a7f1b813e4013155</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">9b184465c3beaa10a7f1b813e4013155</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9da78e2ac3b26610a7f1b813e40131f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-20 18:17:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9da78e2ac3b26610a7f1b813e40131f9"/></record_update>
